abstract: Ten writers will each receive a prize of $50,000.
snippet: Ten writers will each receive a prize of $50,000.
lead_paragraph: The winners of the Whiting Writers' Awards, given annually to authors "of exceptional talent and promise in early career," were announced on Tuesday. The 2011 recipients include the fiction writers Scott Blackwood ("We Agreed to Meet Just Here"), Teddy Wayne ("Kapitoil"), Daniel Orozco ("Orientation") and Ryan Call ("The Weather Stations").

headline.main: Whiting Foundation Names Winners of Writers' Awards
